page.title: 14VISITERS TO THE DALE.
page.content: Tourists when asked why they came to the Yorkshire Dales,especially to Coverdale said for peace & beauty unspoilt countryside to enjoy walking, bird watching & touring other areas. {Traffic Survey _}August Bank Holiday Sunday & Monday 927,cars & 35,motor bikes passed through between 10.00am & 6.30pm. There is another kind of visiter (as the locals look upon them) People who own 2nd. homes 25% of the property falls into this catogary, a few are used weekly,but many only during school holidays and others once a year thats all.{ {Future Developments.} 1985 plans for a barn conversion into a residential field center approved by the Yorkshire Dales National Park Committee in Horsehouse. Upgrading of the disused foot paths.
